item.description:
THERE WILL BE "NO CSI INSTRUCTION OR PRACTICE" AT THE CARVER DEN THIS EVENING February 24, 2011

CLASS WILL BE HELD BY MASTER INSTRUCTOR SARAH TEAGLE

CLASS IS BY INVITATION FOR INTERMEDIATE LEVEL

PLEASE NOTE, THIS IS NOT A BEGINNERS CLASS

CLASS PARTICIPATION IS BY INVITATION ONLY
INVITATION IS EXTENDED TO STEPPERS ON THE RSVP LIST
IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON PARTICIPATING, PLEASE REMOVE YOUR NAME FROM THE RSVP LIST

 


PROGRESSIVE CLASS
TOTAL COST $30


$10 AIRLINE
$20 CLASS
CLASS SIZE IS LIMITED AND IS BY INVITATION ONLY

 


PRIVATE LESSONS WILL BE OFFERED AT A COST OF $40 HOUR ON FEBRUARY 25 BETWEEN THE HOURS 10 A.M. TO 1 P.M.
AND 2 P.M. TO 5 P.M.

CRITERIA: MUST TAKE AND PAY IN FULL FOR CLASS IN ORDER TO BOOK A PRIVATE
IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON TAKING A CLASS THEN YOU ARE NOT ELIGIBLE FOR A PRIVATE LESSON, PRIORITY FOR PRIVATES WILL BE TO STEPPERS WHO ARE ACTIVE AND CONTRIBUTE TO AIRLINE EXPENSES.

MEN ARE ENCOURAGE TO BOOK A PRIVATE ASAP
A DEPOSIT IS REQUIRES TO SECURE YOUR SPOT


NEW TO STEPPIN?
WELCOME, AND PLEASE JOIN US ON THURSDAY AT THE CARVER DEN FOR LESSONS PROVIDED BY THE CERTIFIED STEPPING INSTRUCTORS SCOTT, TRACEY AND AUDREY (Certified Steppin Instructors)
JOIN US AT OUR MONTHLY STEPPIN SET AT SLADES 5 TO 8 P.M. ON FEBRUARY 26, 2011

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin Up Your Game Sarah Teagle Boston Tour Continues Intermediate Class
